items.title: Silver Bullet Data revenue climbs on strong AI performance
items.description: Silver Bullet Data Services Group PLC on Wednesday said revenue increased in 2024, boosted by its 4D artificial intelligence product.The London-based marketing services provider said in a trading...

items.title: 2 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
items.author: Motley Fool
items.description: Berkshire Hathaway's top long-term stock picks are Amazon and Visa. Amazon's diverse business model and leading position in cloud computing make it a strong investment, while Visa's network effect and high-margin transaction fees provide a solid foundation for growth.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Amazon has a diverse business model, including e-commerce and cloud computing, and is well-positioned for long-term growth. Its revenue and profitability have been impressive, and it is a leading player in the growing cloud computing market.

Visa benefits from a strong network effect, as it is the most widely accepted payment card globally. Its transaction-fee-based business model provides a high-margin, capital-light growth opportunity as digital payments continue to expand worldwide.
